comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: fontshub.pro

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin 1.49.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://fontshub.pro/font/ubuntu-download

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter, EasyList, EasyPrivacy

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

When you click "Download Ubuntu", it opens a new tab. Then you have to wait 45 seconds. After that, before you can activate the download link, you have to hit one of the buttons to share the link or click the text that says "This is too difficult for me, I just want to download." See screenshot. But AdGuard Annoyances hides this, and you are just left wondering why nothing happens. Adding `fontshub.pro#@#.download-share-box` fixed the issue for me.

Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/116532973/235729318-1f119d17-4a9f-4149-9298-7b2646183f7b.png)

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: Fix dailymotion.com Ad

comment.body:
There is nothing wrong in opening PR here, it's completely personal choice whether to opne a PR in EL or in AG. EL has very different filter preferences and decesion policy, so you will be confused until you get accustomed to. If you're thinking to do so in EL, here some advice:

- make rules as compact as possbile within a safe range (you see I trimmed down the last underscore in `##div[class^="NewWatchingDiscovery__adSection"]`)
- if a css selector is very likely to be unique to ad and is a form of `##.class` or `###id`, they prefer makeing it generic filter than site-specific. Similar thing holds on network rule too.
- carefully check their file structure: adult sites have dedicated files, pure ad servers and other third-party servers serving ads are separated (corresponding to adservers.txt and thirdparty.txt each), revolving adservers are added without `$third-party`, cosmetic filters are sorted by ASCII code of the rule body than its domain etc.
- Even if you did everything right, sometimes your PR may never be merged. Nobody other than them knows why.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
